Breadth-First.Explanation: Divergent listing of possible cities based on general skyline and language clues.
Broad exploration of several city possibilities with shallow comparisons.
Reintroduces alternative city hypotheses (Vienna, Frankfurt) based on building features.
Shallow comparison of multiple city skylines (Frankfurt, Vienna, Basel) based on tower shapes and counts.

Depth-First.Explanation: Converges on a specific hypothesis of Munich skyline to verify via image lookup.
Focused observation of photo orientation and specific tower features at Hackerbrücke.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Absence of skybridges on Highlight Towers

Depth-First.Explanation: Analyzes specific Munich towers (Uptown, HypoVereinsbank) to verify visibility details.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Uptown Munich and HypoVereinsbank Tower silhouettes

Depth-First.Explanation: Detailed investigation of Munich tram routes and identification of Arnulfpark towers.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Hauptbahnhof tram lines and Arnulfpark towers

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifies administrative district of Arnulfpark using Wikipedia and map clues.
Focuses on Arnulfpark cluster of five high-rises and plans image comparison.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Cluster of five high-rises at railway gateway (Arnulfpark)

Depth-First.Explanation: Narrowed focus on identifying specific tower shapes (cylindrical crown) in Arnulfpark.
Uses tram wire clue to eliminate Frankfurt and considers alternate hypotheses by architectural mismatch.
Focuses on Zurich Oerlikon towers as a specific hypothesis aligning with image features.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad city listing to focused hypothesis on Munich skyline.
After in-depth Munich analysis, reopens broader city possibilities (Vienna, Frankfurt).
Re-centers on Munich Arnulfpark towers, narrowing analysis to specific buildings.
After eliminating Frankfurt, returns to broad comparisons of multiple city skylines.
Converges on a new specific hypothesis for Zurich’s Oerlikon area towers.
